properties.address: 95 Darkley Road, Co Armagh, Armagh BT60 3AY
properties.description: Open from everyday. We welcome everyone at our base and have a green flag award garden for people to enjoy. The kettle is always on and we look forward to helping everyone within our reach. We also have a charity shop and food bank and provide emergency accommodation to everyone within our reach. Crossfire Trust - a space which is a beacon of warmth and welcome in our community.
properties.title: Crossfire Trust

properties.address: The Salvation Army, County Down BT16 2DP
properties.description: Our space is open to all. We serve refreshments including hot drinks, toast, biscuits and squash. There are diferent activities each week colouring, wordsearches, quizzes and more.
